title: About Us
description: This application is a weather and location tracking tool designed to provide real-time weather information and interactive maps. It is part of a project developed at CIFO La Violeta, a vocational training center that promotes innovation and technology.
how_it_works_description: The app uses the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch real-time weather data and forecasts. Users can search for any city to get current weather conditions and a 5-day forecast. The interactive map allows users to explore locations and view weather information.
technologies_description: This app is built with React for the frontend, Material-UI for styling, and i18next for multilingual support. It uses Axios for API requests and integrates with OpenWeatherMap for weather data.
cifo_description: CIFO La Violeta is a vocational training center located in Barcelona, Catalonia. It offers courses in technology, programming, and digital innovation, fostering the development of practical skills and professional growth.
